sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from "react";
import { Col, Row, Form, FormGroup, Label, Button, ModalBody, ModalFooter,Input } from "reactstrap";
import Translate from "../../Translate";
import * as PropTypes from "prop-types";

class AddContact extends Component {
    constructor(){
        props.getPositions()
    }
    render() {
        let {id, props} = this.props;
        let firstname, lastname, username, password, position, active;
        let positions = props.getPositions()
        console.log(position)
        return (
            <React.Fragment>
                <Form
                    onSubmit={e => {
                        e.preventDefault();
                        if (!firstname.value.trim() || !username.value.trim() || !password.value.trim()) {
                            return;
                        }
                        props.addUser({
                            id,
                            firstname: firstname.value,
                            lastname: lastname.value,
                            username: username.value,
                            password: password.value,
                            position: position.value,
                            active: active.value
                        });
                        firstname.value = "";
                        lastname.value = "";
                        username.value = "";
                        password.value = "";
                        position.value = "";
                        active.value = "";
                    }}
                >
                    <ModalBody>
                        <Row>
                            <Col md={6}>
                                <FormGroup>
                                    <Label for="firstName"><Translate name="firstname"/></Label>
                                    <input
                                        className="form-control"
                                        type="text"
                                        name="firstname"
                                        id="firstName"
                                        ref={node => (firstname = node)}
                                        required
                                    />
                                </FormGroup>
                            </Col>
                            <Col md={6}>
                                <FormGroup>
                                    <Label for="lastName"><Translate name="lastname"/></Label>
                                    <input
                                        className="form-control"
                                        type="text"
                                        name="lastname"
                                        id="lastName"
                                        ref={node => (lastname = node)}
                                    />
                                </FormGroup>
                            </Col>
                        </Row>
                        <Row>
                            <Col md={6}>
                                <FormGroup>
                                    <Label for="username"><Translate name="username"/></Label>
                                    <input
                                        className="form-control"
                                        type="text"
                                        name="username"
                                        id="username"
                                        ref={node => (username = node)}
                                        required
                                    />
                                </FormGroup>
                            </Col>
                            <Col md={6}>
                                <FormGroup>
                                    <Label for="password"><Translate name="password"/></Label>
                                    <input
                                        className="form-control"
                                        type="password"
                                        name="password"
                                        id="password"
                                        ref={node => (password = node)}
                                        required
                                    />
                                </FormGroup>
                            </Col>
                        </Row>
                        <Row>
                            <Col md={6}>
                                <FormGroup>
                                    <Label for="position"><Translate name="position"/></Label>
                                    <Input type="select" id="basicselect" name="interested">
                                        <option value="none" defaultValue="" disabled="">
                                            Select
                                        </option>
                                        <option value="design">design</option>
                                        <option value="development">development</option>
                                        <option value="illustration">illustration</option>
                                        <option value="branding">branding</option>
                                        <option value="video">video</option>
                                    </Input>
                                </FormGroup>
                            </Col>
                            <Col md={6}>
                                <FormGroup>
                                    <Label for="active"><Translate name="active"/></Label>
                                    <Input type="select" id="active" name="active">
                                        <option value="0">Այո</option>
                                        <option value="1">Ոչ</option>
                                    </Input>
                                </FormGroup>
                            </Col>
                        </Row>

                    </ModalBody>
                    <ModalFooter>
                        <Button color="primary" type="submit">
                            <Translate name="add"/>
                        </Button>
                    </ModalFooter>
                </Form>
            </React.Fragment>
        );
    }
}

AddContact.propTypes = {
    id: PropTypes.any,
    props: PropTypes.any
}

export default AddContact;
